thread.title: Aston Villa transfer news: Jordan Rhodes bid turned down as Steve Bruce slaps in £10million offer for Middlesbrough striker

author: ashilton
title: Aston Villa transfer news: Jordan Rhodes bid turned down as Steve Bruce slaps in £10million offer for Middlesbrough striker
text:
EFL JOR THE MAN Aston Villa transfer news: Jordan Rhodes bid turned down as Steve Bruce slaps in £10million offer for Middlesbrough striker 
Villa boss Bruce is a long-term admirer of Rhodes and has made his mind up that he wants striker in permanent deal Exclusive
